smazal casto kladenou otazku

smazal polozku
AbcMonitor: zmena v diskusi
pridal komentar
smazal diskusi
uvalil cenzuru na komentar

vytvoril zapisek
smazal zapisek
AbcMonitor: zmena v sekci software
vytvoril softwarovou polozku
upravil softwarovou polozku
smazal softwarovou polozku
AbcMonitor: zmena v sekci hardware
vytvoril hardwarovou polozku
upravil hardwarovou polozku
smazal hardwarovou polozku
AbcMonitor: zmena v sekci kdo je
vytvoril polozku osobnosti
upravil polozku osobnosti
smazal polozku osobnosti
AbcMonitor: zmena ve slovniku pojmu

AbcMonitor: vydani clanku
včera
select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, spolecne S where P.typ=? and P.cislo=R.potomek and typ_potomka='P' and S.typ='P' and S.cislo=R.potomek
select distinct R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, vlastnost V, spolecne S where P.typ=? and P.cislo=R.potomek and R.typ_potomka='P' and S.cislo=R.potomek and S.typ='P'
select R.cislo from kategorie K, relace R, spolecne S where K.cislo=R.potomek and typ_potomka='K' and S.cislo=R.potomek and S.typ='K'

select R.cislo from relace R left join polozka P on P.cislo=R.potomek, spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='P' and R.typ_predka='K' and P.typ=3 and S.cislo=R.potomek and S.typ='P' and P.podtyp = 'question'
select R.cislo from relace R left join polozka P on P.cislo=R.potomek, spolecne S where R.predchozi=? and P.typ=3 and S.cislo=R.potomek and S.typ='P'
select R.cislo from relace R, posledni_komentar K, spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='P' and R.potomek=K.diskuse and S.typ='P' and S.cislo=K.diskuse and K.kdo=?

select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, kategorie K, spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='P' and P.cislo=R.potomek and P.typ=2 and R.typ_predka='K' and R.predek=K.cislo and K.typ=4 and S.typ='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and S.vytvoreno<now()

select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, kategorie K, spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='P' and P.cislo=R.potomek and P.typ=2 and R.typ_predka='K' and R.predek=K.cislo and K.typ=4 and ((P.podtyp!='NOTONINDEX' and P.podtyp!='SUBPORTAL') or P.podtyp is null) and S.typ='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and S.vytvoreno<now()

select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, kategorie K, spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='P' and P.cislo=R.potomek and P.typ=2 and R.typ_predka='K' and R.predek=K.cislo and K.typ=4 and S.typ='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and S.vytvoreno>? and S.vytvoreno<?

select R.cislo from relace R, polozka P, vlastnost V, kategorie K, spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='P' and R.potomek=P.cislo and P.typ=2 and V.typ_predka='P' and P.cislo=V.predek and R.typ_predka='K' and R.predek=K.cislo and K.typ=4 and V.typ='author' and V.hodnota=? and S.typ='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and S.vytvoreno<now()
select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, spolecne S where R.predchozi=42932 and R.typ_potomka='P' and P.typ=7 and P.cislo=R.potomek and S.typ='P' and S.cislo=P.cislo

select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, spolecne S where R.predchozi=42932 and R.typ_potomka='P' and P.typ=7 and P.cislo=R.potomek and S.typ='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and S.vytvoreno>? and S.vytvoreno<?
select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, spolecne S where S.typ='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and S.pridal=? and R.typ_potomka='P' and P.typ=7 and P.cislo=R.potomek
select R.cislo from relace R, polozka P, spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='P' and R.potomek=P.cislo and R.typ_predka='K' and P.typ=3 and S.typ='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and S.pridal=?
select R.predchozi,max(vytvoreno) from relace R, komentar K where R.typ_potomka='Z' and R.potomek=K.zaznam and K.autor=? group by K.zaznam order by 2
select distinct R.cislo from verze V, relace R where kdo=? and R.potomek=V.cislo and R.typ_potomka=V.typ
select R.cislo from relace R, stitkovani T, spolecne S, polozka P where R.typ_potomka=T.typ and R.potomek=T.cislo and R.typ_potomka=S.typ and R.potomek=S.cislo and P.cislo = S.cislo and T.stitek=?
select count(distinct R.cislo) from verze V, relace R where kdo=? and R.potomek=V.cislo and R.typ_potomka=V.typ
select count(distinct R.predchozi) from relace R, komentar K where R.typ_predka='P' and R.typ_potomka='Z' and R.potomek=K.zaznam and K.autor=?
select R.cislo from relace R left join kategorie K on (K.cislo=R.potomek), spolecne S where R.typ_potomka='K' and K.typ=? and S.typ='K' and S.cislo=R.potomek
select R.cislo from relace R, anketa2 A where typ_potomka='A' and potomek=A.cislo and predchozi=250
select cislo from relace where url=?
select max(cislo) from uzivatel
select cislo from uzivatel where login=?
replace into posledni_komentar (kdo,diskuse,posledni,kdy) values(?,?,?,NULL);
select posledni from posledni_komentar where kdo=? and diskuse=?
select diskuse, posledni, kdy from posledni_komentar where kdo=? order by kdy desc limit ?,?
delete from posledni_komentar where kdo=? and kdy<=?
select cislo from polozka where typ=?
select cislo from zaznam where typ=?

select count(P.cislo) from polozka P, vlastnost V, spolecne S where P.typ=2 and P.cislo=V.predek and V.typ_predka='P' and V.typ='author' and V.hodnota=? and S.typ='P' and P.cislo=S.cislo and S.vytvoreno<now()
select V.hodnota, count(P.cislo) from polozka P, vlastnost V where P.typ=2 and P.cislo=V.predek and V.typ_predka='P' and V.typ='author' group by (V.hodnota)
insert into akce (kdo,relace,typ,kdy) values(?,?,?,NULL)
select kdy from akce where kdo=? and relace=? and typ=?
delete from akce where kdo=? and relace=? and typ=?
select R1.potomek, count(R2.cislo) from relace R1, relace R2 where R1.potomek in ? and R1.typ_potomka='K' and R1.cislo=R2.predchozi and R2.typ_potomka='P' group by R1.potomek

select R1.potomek, count(R2.cislo), (select R3.cislo from relace R3, polozka P, spolecne S where R3.typ_predka='K' and R3.predek=R1.potomek and R3.typ_potomka='P' and R3.potomek=P.cislo and S.typ='P' and S.cislo=P.cislo order by S.zmeneno desc limit 1) from relace R1, relace R2 where R1.potomek in ? and R1.typ_potomka='K' and R1.cislo=R2.predchozi and R2.typ_potomka='P' group by R1.potomek
insert into hledano (retezec,pocet) values(?,1)
update hledano set pocet=pocet+1 where retezec=?
select retezec,pocet from hledano where retezec like concat(?,'%') order by pocet desc
insert into statistika (den,typ,pocet) values(curdate(),?,?)
update statistika set pocet=pocet+? where typ=? and den=curdate()
select den,typ,pocet from statistika where
select typ,sum(pocet),date_format(den,"%Y-%m") from statistika group by typ,3 order by 3 asc
insert into stara_adresa (puvodni,rid,nova) values(?,?,?)
select rid,nova from stara_adresa where puvodni=?
select distinct hodnota from vlastnost where typ=?
delete from vlastnost where typ_predka=? and predek=? and typ=?
select R.cislo from polozka P, relace R, kategorie K where R.typ_potomka='P' and P.cislo=R.potomek and P.typ=9 and R.typ_predka='P' and R.predek=K.cislo and K.typ=2

select K.autor, count(distinct K.zaznam) from komentar K, relace R1, relace R2, kategorie F where R1.typ_potomka='Z' and R1.potomek=K.zaznam and R1.predchozi=R2.cislo and R2.typ_predka='K' and R2.predek=F.cislo and F.typ=2 group by K.autor

select V2.hodnota, count(P.cislo) from polozka P, vlastnost V1, relace R, vlastnost V2 where P.typ=2 and V1.predek=P.cislo and V1.typ='author' and V1.hodnota=R.cislo and V2.typ_predka='P' and V2.predek=R.potomek and V2.typ='user' group by V2.hodnota
select kdo,count(distinct cislo,typ) from verze group by kdo
select pridal,count(*) from polozka P, spolecne S where P.typ=7 and S.typ='P' and S.cislo=P.cislo group by S.pridal
select cislo from uzivatel where data like '%<communication><email valid="yes"><weekly_summary>yes%'
select cislo from uzivatel where data like '%<email valid="yes"%<forum>yes%</email%'
select cislo from uzivatel where data like '%<roles>%'
select cislo from uzivatel where login collate utf8_czech_ci = ?
select cislo from uzivatel where prezdivka collate utf8_czech_ci = ?
select cislo from uzivatel where data like concat('%<group>',?,'</group%')
select R.cislo,count(*) from relace R, vlastnost V where V.typ='used_by' and R.typ_potomka='P' and R.potomek=V.predek group by R.potomek order by 2 desc
select R.cislo from relace R, citac C, polozka P where R.typ_potomka='P' and R.potomek=C.cislo and C.typ='P' and C.druh=? and R.potomek=P.cislo and P.typ=? order by soucet desc
select verze,kdo,kdy,obsah,zmena,popis from verze where typ=? and cislo=? order by verze desc limit ?
delete from uzivatel where cislo=?
delete from vlastnost where predek=? and typ='ticket'
update verze set kdo=? where kdo=?
update komentar set autor=? where autor=?
update spolecne set pridal=?, zmeneno=zmeneno where typ='P' and pridal=?
update spolecne set pridal=?, zmeneno=zmeneno where typ='Z' and pridal=?
update spolecne set pridal=?, zmeneno=zmeneno where typ='K' and pridal=?
update vlastnost set hodnota=? where hodnota=? and (typ='user' or typ='used_by' or typ='favourited_by' or typ='member')
select count(*) from vlastnost where hodnota=? and (typ='user' or typ='used_by' or typ='favourited_by' or typ='member')
insert into stitky_log (akce,kdy,stitek,autor,ip,typ,cislo,titulek) values (?,NULL,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select ip,autor from stitky_log where stitek=? and akce='add' order by kdy desc limit 1

select RA.cislo, count(*) from relace RZ, zaznam Z, komentar K, relace RA, polozka PA, relace RD, polozka PD, spolecne S where RA.potomek = PA.cislo and RD.potomek = PD.cislo and RD.predchozi = RA.cislo and PA.typ=? and PD.typ=3 and RD.typ_potomka = 'P' and RA.typ_potomka = 'P' and RZ.predchozi = RD.cislo and RZ.typ_potomka='Z' and RZ.potomek = Z.cislo and Z.typ=4 and K.zaznam = Z.cislo and S.typ = 'P' and S.cislo = RA.potomek and S.vytvoreno > ? group by RZ.cislo order by 2 desc

select R.cislo, C.soucet from relace R, citac C, spolecne S, polozka P where R.potomek=C.cislo and R.typ_potomka='P' and R.potomek=S.cislo and R.potomek=P.cislo and C.druh='read' and S.typ='P' and P.typ=? and S.vytvoreno > ? order by 2 desc
select verze,kdo,kdy,popis from verze where typ=? and cislo=? order by verze desc
insert into verze (typ,cislo,verze,kdo,kdy,obsah,zmena,popis) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,NULL,?)
select kdo,kdy,obsah from verze where typ=? and cislo=? and verze=?
delete from verze where typ=? and cislo=?

select O.id,O.title,O.last_modify_date,O.it,O.linux,C.name as category,R.name as region,F.name as firma,T.name as typ from hr_offer as O, hr_category as C, hr_region as R, hr_company as F, hr_relation as T where C.id=O.idcategory and R.id=O.idregion and F.id=O.idcompany and T.id=O.idrelation and (it=1 or linux=1) order by last_modify_date desc limit 60
abclinuxu.cz: tydenni souhrn
Událo se v týdnu {0}/{1,number,#}
Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
Vaše hodnocení bylo přijato.
Chyba v parametrech pro hlasování.
Můžete hodnotit jen jednou!
Pro hodnocení je nutné se nejdříve přihlásit.
Návrh na anketu,Hlášení chyby,Námět na vylepšení,Problém s účtem,Nová sekce
Re: pozadavek
